name: Tacticraft!
description:
Win epic battles by outsmarting your opponents!
Strategically place your units on the battlefield. Upgrade them and create different synergies by building armories, stables, and other buffs around their camps.
Can you beat all your opponents and climb to the highest rank of the leaderboard?

• Refine your strategy to create the most powerful units
• Experiment with unit/buff combinations and best your enemies
• Challenge players from all over the world to join the best leagues
_
Visit us at: http://www.ludigames.com/

Privacy Policy: http://www.ludigames.com/privacy-notice
